nodes.excerpt: Don’t start with the idea, start with the problem Stupidly, at the start I fell in love with the “idea” of being able to annotate web pages…

frontmatter.title: Validating a new SaaS idea
frontmatter.description: The worst mistake I made was focussing on the idea and not the problem. The best exercise I did was building the landing page first (i.e. the packaging), writing my value propositions and working backwards to the product.

nodes.excerpt: I’ve built 5 failed side hustles over 10 years and my biggest regret isn’t that I failed, it’s that I didn’t fail faster. I’m starting over…

frontmatter.title: Lessons from 5 failed side hustles
frontmatter.description: Stories from 5 failed side hustles, metrics, and how my assumptions changed as each one failed.
